Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".
Like it, like it, like it, hooray for REI!

Yep this is just something extra she could do specifically for other families with a disabled member. That's no bad thing. If I was entitled to DLA for having a disabled son but earnt literally millions and millions of pounds I would donate it to families with more need than I. I actually have a disabled brother and DLA is very strict and they're constantly reviewing it, reducing the amount and trying to take away the help he needs. Therefore I can think of a few families who aren't mega rich who are probably in the same boat as my brother and struggling.

Unless is your Nth wedding... Get yourself a wedding photographer (not just any photographer, an actual wedding photographer!). It is after all, a once (or twice, or thrice for some?) in a lifetime event that you want to have amazing pictures of and while yes your family and friends will take photos and all, do you seriously want to leave it to chance? It is hard work, it takes skill, it takes education and practice. Save expenses somewhere else: invite a couple less people, get another venue, maybe even go for other flower arrangements, etc but definitely don't skimp on the photographer!

Natural organic food interfaces with the bodies systems. Once we process or add growth hormones, pesticides, overcook it, or add ingredients that have been radiated, we alter the natural frequency of the food and thereby alter our cells at its sub-atomic structural level. Continual use of this type of nutrition throughout the years creates health hazards and chronic illnesses.
